home.title: Raon Total Solution | Rotating Equipment & Compressor Parts Specialist
home.description: 30 years of expertise in rotating machinery and reciprocating compressor parts & solutions. Global partnerships for oil refinery, petrochemical, and shipbuilding industries.

company.title: About Us
company.description: Raon Total Solution is a B2B parts solution company founded by rotating machinery experts with 30 years of experience.

industries.description: Specialized rotating equipment parts solutions for oil refinery, petrochemical, and shipbuilding industries.

hero.title: Rotating Equipment & Compressor Parts

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Building customer success together with 30 years of expertise and trust

ceo.title: CEO Message
ceo.message: Raon Total Solution is a B2B parts solution company founded by rotating machinery experts with over 30 years of experience. We supply core components such as compressors, pumps, and mixers specialized for the oil refinery, petrochemical, and shipbuilding industries, providing the highest quality and technical expertise through our global partnerships.
ceo.name: CEO

history.title: History
history.description: The Journey of Raon Total Solution

2025: Signed domestic agency contract with WTQ and CP Pumpen
2024: Signed domestic agency contract with NIDEC and Samyoung Filtech
Started business with HD Hyundai Oilbank and TJG Huchems
2023: Established Raon Total Solution Co., Ltd.
Signed exclusive domestic distributor contract with NEA Group NEUMAN & ESSER Compressor
Signed exclusive domestic distributor contract with SPXFLOW
Started business with SK Energy, GS Caltex, and S-OIL
